title: Bugged rune page
body:
I can't change my runepage - I can rename it and put in new runes but when I try to pick it for a game it doesnt work - I end up with the other page (the page named "ad speedd")
My last 2 rune pages don't work correctly, they always have the same name and stats as each other no matter what i do to them. Then when I go into champion select, when I pick either of them, the rune page selector immediately jumps to the first rune page on my list. It started around patch 7.6.
Something about the 2 runes pages being "tied together"

Thank you in advance for any help that you can offer.

replies.body: We've been tracking this issue and would like to help!  Rename your impacted runes, and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can review your issue.  Let them know what you've renamed them to in your ticket to speed things up a bit.  We'll get back to you as fast as we can!
